message.raw:
Added a check in ByteCountingXMLScanner to account for cases where the assumption
that all files start with the first byte belonging to the doctype declaration. This
assumption was violated by the presence of a BOM, which was unintentionally padded
with a delimiting character, causing all byte offsets counted to be off by 1 byte.
